translation.en: Hollywood, California. Tinseltown is boomtown.
translation.es: Hollywood, California. La fábrica de sueños está en auge.

translation.en: During the war, Los Angeles grew as a hub of wartime industry,
translation.es: Durante la guerra, Los Ángeles creció como centro de la industria de la guerra.

translation.en: producing all manner of aircraft and ammunition
to support our fighting men overseas.
translation.es: para apoyar a nuestras tropas en el extranjero.

translation.en: The war now over,
many of these starry- eyed dreamers hope to make it in moving pictures,
translation.es: muchos de estos soñadores esperan triunfar en el cine

translation.en: swarming like so many locusts outside the studio gates,
translation.es: y se amontonan como cuervos fuera de los estudios,

translation.en: hoping to score a role as an extra
translation.es: con la esperanza de ser extras

translation.en: and become the next Paul Muni or Hedy Lamarr.
translation.es: y ser el próximo Paul Muni o Hedy Lamarr.

translation.en: The studio system is king,
and if you make all the right moves, you too could be living in Beverly Hills,
translation.es: y con las jugadas correctas, podrías vivir en Beverly Hills,

translation.en: splashing in your private pool with invitations to all the right parties.
translation.es: bañarte en tu piscina privada e ir a las mejores fiestas.

translation.en: You might even become immortalized at Grauman's Chinese Theatre.
translation.es: Hasta quizá te inmortalicen en el Teatro Chino de Grauman.

translation.en: The rewards for ambition are bountiful here
translation.es: La ambición se recompensa de forma abundante aquí,

translation.en: in the beautiful Southern California sun.
translation.es: bajo el hermoso sol del Sur de California.

translation.en: Pardon me. Beg your pardon.
Sorry, excuse me.
Excuse me, pardon me.
Excuse me, coming through. Sorry.
translation.es: Disculpe, con permiso. Disculpen. Permiso. Perdón. ¡Hola, Lou!

translation.en: - Hiya, Lou! - Hey, Jackie. Get over here, kid.
translation.es: Perdón. ¡Hola, Lou! Hola, Jackie. Ven, amigo.

translation.en: - Say, what time'd you get here? - About an hour ago,
translation.es: ¿A qué hora llegaste? Hace como una hora.

translation.en: - early birds getting worms and such. - Sure.
translation.es: - Al que madruga Dios lo ayuda. - Sí.

translation.en: They're still lensing the John Farrow picture with Alan Ladd and Donna Reed.
translation.es: Ruedan la película de John Farrow con Alan Ladd y Donna Reed.

translation.en: - Lensing? - Lensing.
It's how you say filmmaking in Hollywood- ese. You gotta learn the lingo.
translation.es: Filman en Hollywood. Debes aprender la jerga.

translation.en: Billy Wilder is helming a picture with Emperor Franz--
translation.es: Billy Wilder capitanea una película con el emperador...

translation.en: - Helming? - Directing.
Bing Crosby, Joan Fontaine, it's gonna be boffo BO.
translation.es: Bing Crosby, Joan Fontaine, será un éxito de taquilla.

translation.en: And she thinks we're gonna start the day on the big ballroom scene.
translation.es: Ella cree que empezaremos con la gran escena del baile.

translation.en: Lots of extras. People standing by the punch bowl,
translation.es: Muchos extras. Gente parada junto al ponche

translation.en: folks crossing the hallway when they enter the big door.
translation.es: y cruzando el pasillo cuando entran.

translation.en: I think I got a real shot at that one.
What about a western or war picture? Something like that.
translation.es: ¿Qué tal una wéstern o película de guerra?

translation.en: They making any of those?
You don't say making a movie, Jack. You produce a movie, produce.
translation.es: No se dice hacer una película. Se dice producir.

translation.en: You gotta know this stuff if you wanna make it big time.
Shh, shh, shh! Here she comes, the old gorgon herself.
Okay, listen up. I'm only gonna say this once.
translation.es: Escuchen. Solo lo diré una vez.

translation.en: Rule number one, do not look at the camera.
translation.es: Primera regla: no miren a la cámara.

translation.en: Rule number two, do not talk to the director.
translation.es: Segunda: no hablen con el director.

translation.en: In fact, a good rule of thumb is to not talk at all.
translation.es: Una buena regla de oro es no hablar.

translation.en: Rule number three, if you see a platter of food on the sound stage, do not eat it.
translation.es: Tercera: no toquen la comida del estudio de sonido.

translation.en: That is not for you. That is for the actors and the crew.
translation.es: No es para ustedes. Es para los actores y el equipo.

translation.en: If you see food on the set, do not eat that. That is a prop.
translation.es: No toquen la comida del plató. Es utilería.

translation.en: Now we have that out of the way.
Today, we're lensing a scene from a war pic.
- Lensing. - Seven were saved where the plane goes down,
translation.es: - Rodar. - Sobreviven siete del accidente aéreo

translation.en: and a bunch of passengers flail around in the water and then die, okay?
translation.es: y un grupo de pasajeros se agita en el agua y muere, ¿sí?

translation.en: - - All right, uh, you,
- and you... - Thanks!
You, you and you...
uh, you...
and...
- you. -
Okay, thank you very much. That's it for today. See y'all tomorrow.
translation.es: Bien, muchas gracias. Es todo por hoy. Hasta mañana.

translation.en: Excuse me, Ms. Roswell. Beg your pardon, Jack Castello.
translation.es: Disculpe, señorita Roswell. Perdón. Jack Castello.

translation.en: I think I'd be great in your war picture.
translation.es: Yo sería genial para su película.

translation.en: The drowning scene? You see, I fought at Anzio.
translation.es: ¿La escena del ahogamiento? Peleé en Anzio.

translation.en: - Oh, you have training? - Sure, Fort Benning, Georgia.
Mm, I mean acting training. - You got any of that? - Well, no.
Good- looking kid like you, you think you just gotta show up and poof,
translation.es: - No. - Como eres apuesto, ¿crees que vienes y ya eres estrella de cine?

translation.en: you're a movie star, huh? Well, that ain't how it works.
translation.es: ¿crees que vienes y ya eres estrella de cine? Así no funciona.

translation.en: Pretty face, but no training.
Kid, you're a dime a dozen.
Look, first breaks are tough in this town.
translation.es: Es difícil empezar en este lugar.

translation.en: Don't beat yourself up.
No, no, no, no.
Already taken care of.
- What does he want? - Don't know. Maybe he thought you looked thirsty.
translation.es: - ¿Qué quiere? - No sé. Quizá parecías sediento.

translation.en: Now, you're looking for a loan of about $20,000?
Yes, that's right. Just enough for a modest home.
translation.es: Sí. Lo suficiente para un hogar modesto.

translation.en: Swell, let's take a look at your application.
I see you're a veteran, Mr. Castello. Thank you for your service.
translation.es: Es un veterano, señor Castello. Gracias por su servicio.

translation.en: And Mrs. Castello, you are a waitress.
translation.es: Y, señora Castello, usted es mesera.

translation.en: Yes, and I intend to keep working until the baby arrives.
translation.es: Sí, y pienso trabajar hasta que llegue el bebé.

translation.en: So, you're expecting?
Well, congratulations.
And Mr. Castello,
it says here you're a film actor. Any pictures I might know you from?
translation.es: dice que es actor. ¿Alguna película que conozca?

translation.en: Ah, probably not. Uh, to me, it's not about the notoriety, it's about the craft.
translation.es: Probablemente, no. No me importa la fama. Me importa el arte.

translation.en: It's about showing up to work every day, you know.
translation.es: Ir a trabajar todos los días.

translation.en: - And for a super, that can mean-- - I'm sorry, a what?
Oh, a supernumerary. A supernumerary.
- It means extra. - It means background actor.
That's the proper term.
In many ways, we contribute to the reality of the scene
translation.es: Contribuimos a la realidad de la escena

translation.en: even more so than the principal actors.
But I don't see any income here.
Uh, no, presently not, but, uh...
But hey! I've got a casting tomorrow,
and if they pick me, that's ten dollars in my pocket!
translation.es: y, si me eligen, ¡ganaré diez dólares!

translation.en: Very well. Uh...
Unfortunately, Mr. and Mrs. Castello,
we would be unable to provide a loan of the size that you're seeking
translation.es: no podríamos otorgarles el préstamo que buscan

translation.en: based on your current income.
Listen, thank you for your time, sir.
One of those days, huh?
Bartender, two more, please.
- Why are you buying me drinks? - To thank you for your service.
translation.es: ¿Por qué me invitas? Para agradecerte. ¿No serviste? ¿Dónde peleaste?

translation.en: You served, didn't you? Where'd you fight?
- Anzio. - Anzio!
Anzio was rough.
Ernie.
- Jack. - Nice to meet you.
I wanted to fight. Tried to enlist and everything, but they wouldn't take me. - Said my cock was too big. -
translation.es: Quise alistarme, no me aceptaron. Mi pito era muy grande.

translation.en: Yeah, surprised me too. I mean, it's big.
translation.es: Sí, también me sorprendió. Es grande.

translation.en: Twelve inches, soup to nuts, and not floppy either.
translation.es: Hasta la punta, 30,5 centímetros y no es flácido.

translation.en: I get hard as a fucking rock.
translation.es: Me pongo duro como roca, carajo.

translation.en: Are you for real? What are you talking about?
- I got a very big dick. - No, I...
translation.es: - Tengo un pito muy grande. - No...

translation.en: I heard you when you said that. I'm wondering why. Why are you...
translation.es: Te escuché. Me pregunto por qué...

translation.en: coming up to a stranger in a bar, talking about how big your cock is?
translation.es: ¿Por qué le dices a un extraño lo grande que es tu pito?

translation.en: - Because you asked me. - Did I? Does not sound like me.
Look, all I'm saying is I know a hard- luck fella when I sees one.
translation.es: Solo digo que reconozco la mala suerte al verla.

translation.en: I used to be right where you are.
I used to worry about my wife and kids... They're grown now.
translation.es: Me preocupaba por mi esposa e hijos. Ya crecieron. Ella murió.

translation.en: She's dead, God bless her. Good woman.
translation.es: Que Dios la bendiga. Era buena.

translation.en: But I've been where you are, wondering what my life was gonna mean.
translation.es: Pero he estado en tu lugar, - pensando en el futuro. - ¿Qué quieres?

translation.en: - What do you want? - I run a service station.
translation.es: - pensando en el futuro. - ¿Qué quieres? Tengo una gasolinera.

translation.en: And business is booming!
I could use a good- looking fella like yourself pumping gas.
translation.es: Me vendría bien un gasolinero apuesto como tú.

translation.en: Why do you need someone good- looking to pump gas?
My gas station specializes in good- looking attendants.
It's my corner of the market, it's why we do good business. This is Hollywood, kid!
translation.es: Acaparamos el mercado. Por eso nos va bien. ¡Es Hollywood!

translation.en: It's what people want.
It's why they left their cow towns where they grew up.
translation.es: Por eso dejaron las vacas atrás.

translation.en: They don't want some fatso looking under their hood,
translation.es: No quieren que les revise el capó un gordo

translation.en: just reeking of sweat, grease under their fingernails.
translation.es: con olor a sudor y grasa bajo las uñas.

translation.en: It's an intimate act, if you think about it,
translation.es: Es un acto íntimo, si lo piensas,

translation.en: and, get this...
They'll tip big for it.
This is for you.
Thanks.
What I offer is a vision of a new America.
translation.es: Ofrezco una visión de unos nuevos Estados Unidos.

translation.en: The America that you fought for.
You're very kind, but no. Okay.
Citrus and Normandy, if you change your mind.
translation.es: Citrus y Normandie, si cambias de opinión.

translation.en: Golden Tip Gas.
It's not our anniversary, is it?
They cut our electricity, Jack.
Well...
sure is romantic, baby, huh?
Don't bother. You already knocked me up.
translation.es: No te molestes. Ya estoy embarazada.

translation.en: Cold wieners are on the table for you.
translation.es: Tienes salchichas frías en la mesa.

translation.en: That looks good.
Kid, I gotta tell you, you look fantastic.
translation.es: Debo decirte que te ves fantástico.

translation.en: Handsome, young, brimming with optimism.
And, oh, by the way, you're clean, right? No venereal disease?
translation.es: Y estás libre de enfermedades venéreas, ¿no?

translation.en: Okay, what is-- What do you mean? What are you talking about?
Look, kid, this town is all about dreams, right?
translation.es: - ¿De qué hablas? - Mira. Este lugar se trata de sueños, ¿no?

translation.en: You know that.
And some of my customers don't just come here for gas.
translation.es: Algunos de mis clientes quieren más que gasolina.

translation.en: They have, uh, fantasies and desires.
And for them, it ain't enough to watch a fantasy up on the big screen.
translation.es: No les alcanza ver una fantasía en la pantalla grande.

translation.en: They want it for themselves, and I provide that for them.
translation.es: La quieren para ellos, y yo se las doy.

translation.en: In a way, I'm no different than Louis B. Mayer, you know what I mean?
translation.es: En cierto modo, soy como Louis B. Mayer. ¿Entiendes?

translation.en: No, Ernie, I have no idea what you mean. You see, some of them say a secret code word.
translation.es: - No, no entiendo. - Algunos usan una clave.

translation.en: You get in the car with them. Have a drink maybe, or sometimes...
translation.es: Te subes al auto. Tomas un trago o a veces...

translation.en: sometimes you have to service 'em.
You gotta... you gotta be kidding me.
What? You don't like women?
translation.es: - ¿No te gustan las mujeres? - Claro que sí.

translation.en: Sure, I like women, that's why I married one.
translation.es: - ¿No te gustan las mujeres? - Claro que sí. Por eso me casé con una.

translation.en: All right, so let me ask you...
- You never cheated on her? - No.
Okay, I'm going to ask you again.
You never cheated on her?
Oh, Jack.
No, uh... One time. One time, I was... I was on leave, I was drunk.
translation.es: No... Una vez. Estaba de licencia y ebrio.

translation.en: Then you're good!
First time's always the hardest, and you got that outta the way.
translation.es: La primera vez es la más difícil.

translation.en: You're gonna be great.
Oh, here's one right here.
Jack, today is your lucky day.
translation.es: Jack, hoy es tu día de suerte.

translation.en: - - This one's special, take it from me.
No.
No, no, no. Ernie, I'm not doing this.
I came here to be in pictures, I'm gonna be a movie star.
translation.es: Vine a ser actor. Seré una estrella de cine.

translation.en: This, this is not for me. I-- I appreciate...
translation.es: Esto no es para mí. Gracias...

translation.en: Look, you hired me to pump gas, I'll pump gas.
translation.es: Me contrataste como gasolinero. Eso seré.

translation.en: This, forget it. So long.
All right, but you just missed out on 100 bucks.
translation.es: Muy bien, pero te perdiste 100 dólares.

translation.en: My customers pay twice that,
and you and me, we split it, 50- 50.
translation.es: y tú y yo lo dividimos. Mitad y mitad.

translation.en: So, are you gonna take it?
Or am I giving it to one of the other guys?
Fuck me.
Attaboy!
You're gonna do great.
- Shut up. - Let me know how it goes.
translation.es: - Lo harás muy bien. - Cállate. Cuéntame cómo estuvo.

translation.en: Fill 'er up? I wanna go to Dreamland.
Okay.
You'll do nicely.
Welcome.
Where are we going?
I got us a room. My daughter's at home.
translation.es: Reservé una habitación. Mi hija está en casa.

translation.en: You aren't nervous about being recognized?
That's the fun of it.
So, how long have you been here?
Oh, you-- you mean in Los Angeles?
Just a couple of months. I'm from Missouri originally.
translation.es: Un par de meses. Soy de Misuri.

translation.en: Let me guess...
you came here to be a movie star.
translation.es: Viniste a ser estrella de cine.

translation.en: How did you know?
Takes one to know one.
I was in pictures. Silent films.
Good ones, too.
But then came the talkies.
I had one screen test,
and they told me there wasn't a place in talkies for ethnics.
translation.es: y me dijeron que no había lugar para las etnias.

translation.en: A little Jewey was the word they used.
I politely informed them that Jews built this town and was shown the door.
translation.es: Les informé cortésmente que los judíos construyeron este lugar y me echaron.

translation.en: Nobody thought a Jewish girl could be a movie star.
translation.es: Nadie creía que una judía podía ser estrella de cine.

translation.en: Nobody thought they were pretty.
So, I went to a bar and got drunk,
translation.es: Así que fui a un bar, me emborraché

translation.en: met a low- level executive who said he was about to get a promotion.
translation.es: y conocí a un ejecutivo de bajo nivel que iba a ser ascendido.

translation.en: He said the only thing I could hope for was to be a development girl.
translation.es: Dijo que yo solo podía esperar trabajar en desarrollo.

translation.en: A goddamn script reader.
I said, Fuck this town, I'm done.
He knocked me up, we got married, and I've been punishing him ever since.
translation.es: Me embarazó, nos casamos y lo castigo desde entonces.

translation.en: Oh, he did get that promotion, though.
Now he's the star, not this Jew.
translation.es: Ahora, él es la estrella, no esta judía.

translation.en: Can I ask you a question, Jack?
Why do you want to be a movie star?
translation.es: ¿Por qué quieres ser estrella de cine?

translation.en: You want an honest answer?
Well, we're about to get naked and fuck each other, so why not?
translation.es: Estamos a punto de desnudarnos y coger. ¿Por qué no?

translation.en: Well, um, if I'm being honest...
all my life, folks thought I was dumb.
My mom and dad, my school teachers-- Oh, thank you.
translation.es: Mi mamá y mi papá, maestros... Gracias.

translation.en: All telling me I was lucky I was good- looking.
translation.es: Todos me decían que tuve suerte de ser apuesto.

translation.en: And I knew what they meant,
that that was all I had going for me.
translation.es: A que era mi único atributo.

translation.en: I just want to do something big, you know?
Prove to them that I can be somebody in this world.
Do something that matters.  So movies...
you think they matter?
You kidding?
I know they do.
When you're walking through your life,
it's easy to feel like you're going through the motions, right?
translation.es: es fácil sentir que haces las cosas, ¿no?

translation.en: Like it doesn't really mean anything.
But when I was a kid...
I grew up on a farm in Missouri, so we had to drive a half hour to get to the picture show.
translation.es: vivía en una granja en Misuri, a media hora en auto del cine.

translation.en: And when I looked up at that enormous screen,
translation.es: Y al ver esa enorme pantalla,

translation.en: I suddenly knew what life was supposed to feel like,
translation.es: supe de repente cómo debía ser la vida,

translation.en: what being alive was supposed to mean.
It was like there was something somewhere out there...
waiting for me.
That's what being alive is supposed to mean.
translation.es: Es lo que se supone que significa estar vivo.

translation.en: I held my first hand at a movie theater,
translation.es: Tuve mi primera cita y mi primer beso en un cine...

translation.en: I-- I had my first kiss at a movie theater, I...
translation.es: Tuve mi primera cita y mi primer beso en un cine... No sé.

translation.en: What I do know is this: every time I leave the picture show, I feel better than I did walking in.
translation.es: Lo que sí sé es que al salir del cine, me siento mejor que al entrar.

translation.en: I never thought about it like that.
Can I ask you a question?
Only if you come and sit by me.
translation.es: Solo si te sientas a mi lado.

translation.en: I'm paying for company.
Why are you here?
I mean, doing this with me.
You got a husband you don't like?
Truth is, I don't entirely know how I'd get out of it.
translation.es: La verdad es que no sé cómo no vivir así.

translation.en: I've gotten used to being rich, being taken care of.
translation.es: Me he acostumbrado a ser rica, a que me mantengan.

translation.en: But I know that he can barely bring himself to touch me anymore.
translation.es: Y sé que él apenas puede tocarme.

translation.en: So what's a girl to do?
Bridge? Parcheesi?
I tried sleeping with the help, but that's no good.
translation.es: Me acosté con empleados. No sirve.

translation.en: This is much easier.
Less complicated.
You know, coming to a public place like this, it's, uh...
translation.es: Venir a un lugar público como este...

translation.en: it's kinda like you're asking to be caught. Maybe I am.
translation.es: - Parece que quiere que la descubran. - Quizá.

translation.en: Maybe I want to make my husband jealous.
translation.es: Quizá quiera darle celos a mi esposo.

translation.en: Maybe I want him to know...
that someone else desires me.
And that I'm still alive...
with so much more to give.
You're married.
Yeah, I am.
Do you feel guilty?
I gotta provide.
Then provide.
Yeah.
Listen...
How exactly do we, uh, get started?
Well, first you take your shoes off.
Oh, yeah. Got it.
My...
aren't I a lucky gal?
Listen, before we--
Can I ask you a question?
Just 'cause you've been through it.
You think I got what it takes?
I mean, to make it in this town?
Who can say?
But what I do know, Jack,
translation.es: Pero lo que sí sé, Jack,

translation.en: is you have a strong light inside you.
translation.es: es que tienes una luz fuerte dentro de ti.

translation.en: Shine that light on me.
Make me feel like I matter.
Even if it's a lie.
- Okay. -
Sammy, nice work. Ricky Boy, that's for you.
translation.es: Sammy, buen trabajo. Ricky, para ti.

translation.en: Bad Man Bruce, - Rough Ronny. - Thank you.
Hey, there, champ! I heard it went great!
And here's this for your trouble.
translation.es: Y esto es por tu esfuerzo.

translation.en: Not too bad, right?
Avis is a real pistol, ain't she? Ten- year regular of yours truly.
translation.es: Avis está llena de sorpresas, ¿no? Clienta desde hace diez años.

translation.en: No, it was, uh... She was kind.
It was actually all right.
Good. In that case, I got another one for you.
translation.es: Bien. En ese caso, te tengo otro.

translation.en: Just a quickie in the shed behind the station. Won't take you ten minutes.
translation.es: Un rapidín detrás de la estación. Ni diez minutos.

translation.en: - Right now? - Right now!
All yours, Kemosabe.
Well, hello there.
Ernie, there's been a mistake.
There's some guy in there.
translation.es: Hay un tipo ahí. Un tipo.

translation.en: That's not just some guy.
That's Cole Porter. He's a living legend.
translation.es: Es Cole Porter. Una leyenda viviente.

translation.en: The Gay Divorcee, Anything Goes...
Yesterday I heard you humming Don't Fence Me In.
translation.es: Anything goes... Tarareabas Don't Fence Me In.

translation.en: That's the son of a bitch who wrote it!
So?
So give the guy two minutes of your time. He's real polite about it.
translation.es: Dale dos minutos de tu tiempo. Es muy educado.

translation.en: - Don't keep him waiting! - Are you...
Are you telling me you expect me to...
Forget it! Forget it, Ernie, I'm not doing that!
I'm not-- It's not me. It's not me!
I gotta draw the line somewhere, all right? I'm not doing it!
translation.es: Debo poner un límite, ¿sí? ¡No lo haré!

translation.en: - End of story. - Okay.
I see how it goes.
You don't get to set the terms of your employment here, Jack, I do!
translation.es: ¡Yo establezco las reglas de tu empleo!

translation.en: And I'm running low on guys this month and I got a bad cough I can't shake.
translation.es: Me faltan hombres este mes y tengo una tos que no se va.

translation.en: I'm not sitting at some shitty smokey bar to headhunt.
translation.es: No iré a un bar de mierda a cazar talentos.

translation.en: So if you can't walk into a shed and lend a helping hand
translation.es: Así que si no puedes ir a darle una mano

translation.en: to national treasure Cole Porter, you better find me somebody who can.
translation.es: al tesoro nacional Cole Porter, búscame a alguien que pueda.

translation.en: Otherwise, no money,
and you can get the fuck out of here!
That suits me fine.
I quit.
Yeah, well, good luck then, kid!
I wanted to be a movie star too, you know!
translation.es: ¡Yo también quería ser estrella de cine!

translation.en: Sweetheart.
What are you doing here?
Doctor's appointment? Jeez, yeah. Um...
translation.es: - ¿La cita con el médico? - Vaya, sí.

translation.en: Tell Rudy I'm taking my break.
You two own your own home?
No, we're just renting at the moment.

translation.es: - No, alquilamos. - El cérvix está bien.

because you know what they say,
having a kid is just as expensive as having a mortgage.
translation.es: Tener un hijo cuesta tanto como una hipoteca.

translation.en: All right, let's see if we can hear a heartbeat.
Now, just relax.
Starting on the nursery yet?
No, we're in an efficiency so there really isn't room for a separate nursery.
translation.es: No, vivimos en un departamento. No tenemos espacio.

translation.en: So you're having a baby and looking for a new apartment?
translation.es: ¿Tendrán un bebé y buscarán departamento nuevo?

translation.en: Sheesh, that's no fun.
Are you finding a heartbeat, or...
They've also raised the price on formula, so keep that in mind.
translation.es: Aumentó la leche en polvo. Ténganlo en cuenta.

translation.en: What?
Twins.
- What? - What?
- Yep. Two heartbeats. - You gotta be kidding me.
translation.es: Sí. Hay dos pulsos. Debe ser una broma.

translation.en: - - Jack!
- Hiya, Jack. - Flo.
How's Hollywood treating you? Oh, you know, I'm living the dream.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo te trata Hollywood? - Es un sueño.

translation.en: - Mm- hm. - Listen, I got a favor to ask you.
I'm a little short on cash, but I could really use a costume.
translation.es: No tengo dinero, pero necesito un traje.

translation.en: What kind of costume?
- One, please. - Um...
Uh, you don't have to pay, Officer. You can just go right in.
Damn right, I don't have to pay.
How are you today?
I'm fine, how are you?
- I'm well. - Yeah?
You got any money, honey?
Sure do.
I bet you do.
Get out of here.
Shit!
You're coming with me.
Shit.
Walk.
- Are you going to put me in jail? - Shut up. Keep walking.
- Got a squad car somewhere, or-- - I said can it!
- We're going right around the corner. - Schwab's is around the corner.
translation.es: - Vamos a la vuelta. - Ahí está Schwab's.

translation.en: What, you don't like Schwab's?
What?
Could you just do me a favor and clue me in here?
Am I getting arrested?
Listen, you're gonna get honest with me real fast
or I'm taking you downtown to the lock- up.
translation.es: o te llevaré directo a la cárcel.

translation.en: Hey, Jack, it's ready.
Let's go.
Hey, Jack, what's with the get- up?
Nothing. It's just my uniform.
I wear it when I'm on duty.
I'll have a cup of coffee. My friend here will have a Shirley Temple.
translation.es: Café para mí y un Shirley Temple para mi amigo.

translation.en: That's awfully rude, don't you think?
Explain yourself.
- What do you want me to say? - Start from the beginning, why don't you?
translation.es: - ¿Qué quiere que diga? - Empieza desde el principio.

translation.en: Okay.
I moved to LA after I got out of the service.
translation.es: Me mudé a Los Ángeles tras mi servicio militar.

translation.en: I wanted to be a writer.
Still do.
I wrote a script, you know?
Screenplay about Peg Entwistle,
a girl who jumped off the Hollywood sign because the town wouldn't accept her.
translation.es: que se tiró del cartel de Hollywood porque la ciudad no la aceptaba.

translation.en: I know the feeling, so I wrote about it.
translation.es: La entiendo, así que escribí sobre eso.

translation.en: Sold my script, too.
But a hundred bucks...
ain't much,
and a studio ain't gonna put a black man under contract.
translation.es: Y los estudios no contratan a negros.

translation.en: I got...
Can I smoke?
Yeah, go ahead.
Thank you.
You need money?
I get a dollar a script
translation.es: Me dan un dólar por guion

translation.en: down at the Lincoln Theater, writing vaudeville sketches.
translation.es: en el teatro Lincoln, por escenas de vodevil.

translation.en: But that's once a week, so the way I see it, gotta turn these tricks.
translation.es: Es una vez por semana, así que, en mi opinión, debo venderme.

translation.en: And I can't go cruise Pershing Square or the farmer's market, okay?
translation.es: Y no puedo ir a Pershing Square o al mercado, ¿sí?

translation.en: Cops will arrest me just for loitering, so I turn my tricks up at Joe's place.
translation.es: Me arrestarían por merodear, así que me vendo en donde Joe.

translation.en: Beats washing dishes,
and I like doing it.
Why not get paid for something that feels good that you was gonna do anyways?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no pedir dinero si te hace bien y lo harías igual?

translation.en: I'm discerning.
- My tricks gotta be good- looking, clean-- - So, you're a gigolo.
translation.es: - Deben ser bonitos, limpios... - Eres gigoló.

translation.en: I'm a writer.
Call it whatever you want.
I ain't ashamed.
I know who I am.
Now, Miss Shirley here is delicious.
What if I told you I could offer you an opportunity?
A job, doing what you're doing, but safer.
translation.es: Haciendo lo que haces, pero más seguro.

translation.en: What the hell kind of cop are you?
I know a fella who owns a gas station.
translation.es: Conozco a un tipo con una gasolinera.

translation.en: You pump gas, some customers you do a little more, you know what I'm saying.
translation.es: Llenas el tanque y a algunos, otra cosa. Tú me entiendes.

translation.en: Pay is good, very good.
More than what you're charging.
And if you wanted to, you could just do guys.
translation.es: Y podrías ocuparte solo de hombres.

translation.en: You ain't no real cop.
Also, I do wanna ask you. I gotta ask you...
Pall Malls.
Could you make it with a woman if you had to?
Yeah.
Sure, I can fake it. Ain't that what most fellas do with their wives anyways?
translation.es: Puedo fingir. ¿No lo hace la mayoría con sus esposas?

translation.en: - He's paying for it. - Okay.
I'm gonna take you to meet my friend Ernie.
translation.es: Vamos a conocer a mi amigo Ernie.

translation.en: First, you're right, I'm not a cop.
translation.es: Primero, tienes razón. No soy policía.

translation.en: I'm an actor.
But, until that moment just then,
you thought I was a cop, didn't you?
What I mean is, you would cast me as a cop...
translation.es: Me darías el papel de policía.

translation.en: right?
Sweet beans in a basket.
He'll do the guy stuff? Ask him.
If the price is right.
- 50- 50. - I'm worth more than that, 60- 40.
translation.es: - Mitad y mitad. - Valgo más que eso, 60-40.

translation.en: I like this kid. Enterprising.
Okay, deal.
Ernie West.
- Archie Coleman. - You're gonna do a lot of business, kid.
I can tell just by looking at you.
What's the password again?
Dreamland.
He's all yours, go get him.
translation.es: Es todo tuyo. Ve por él.

translation.en: I knew you'd be back.
They always come back.
How's it going?
Can I help you?
Uh, yeah, I want to go to Wonderland.
translation.es: Sí, quiero ir a la playa.

translation.en: The street?
Oh, that's up there on Laurel Canyon.
You mean Dreamland?
Yeah. Dreamland.
Okay.
What can I do for you?
Uh, I don't know. Are there-- are there options here, or...
You're not interested in a black man?
No, I'm just a little nervous.
What's your name?
Roy. Roy Fitzgerald.
Archie.
This your place? Yeah.
I'm renting month- to- month.
I know it ain't much, but it's all I can afford right now.
translation.es: Sé que no es mucho, pero es todo lo que puedo pagar.

translation.en: What do you want?
- What do you mean? - I mean what do you want to do...
to me?
Or what do you want me to do to you?
Oh, you're, uh...
I like how straightforward you are.
Yeah.
Well, I just wanna make sure you get your money's worth, Mr. Roy Fitzgerald.
translation.es: Quiero hacer valer su dinero, señor Roy Fitzgerald.

translation.en: Can I ask you something?
Where are you from?
Illinois. Little town called Winnetka.
Fitzgerald's my stepdad, Scherer's my real dad's name.
translation.es: Fitzgerald de adopción. Mi papá biológico es Scherer.

translation.en: I came out here to reconnect with him, but...
it didn't really wash.
What about you? Where are you from?
Where am I from?
Memphis.
So, what's a good- looking guy like yourself doing paying for affection?
translation.es: ¿Qué hace un chico guapo como tú pagando por afecto?

translation.en: Why not just go to those joints on Main Street?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no vas a Main Street?

translation.en: Harold to the 1- 2- 3... Cookie, you're making me nervous.
translation.es: A algún bar gay... Me pones nervioso.

translation.en: Relax.
I'll take good care of you.
translation.es: Me ocuparé muy bien de ti.

translation.en: Uh, I went down there once, but...
I-- I saw somebody I thought I recognized.
A casting director.
So I pretended like I was in the wrong place and-- and walked out.
translation.es: Fingí que estaba en el lugar equivocado y me fui.

translation.en: I'm gonna be an actor, see? So...
I-- I can't have anybody thinking I'm...
translation.es: ...no puedo dejar que piensen que soy...

translation.en: that way.
I'm lucky I'm not trying to be in front of the camera.
translation.es: Tengo suerte de no querer ser actor.

translation.en: That just wouldn't work for somebody like me.
translation.es: No funcionaría para alguien como yo.

translation.en: - That's why I'm a writer. - A writer? You don't say.
Yeah. Well, I got a studio looking at one of my scripts.
translation.es: Sí. Bueno, un estudio lee un guion mío.

translation.en: It could be a first, you know? Major studio, black writer.
translation.es: Podría sentar precedente. Gran estudio, escritor negro.

translation.en: I mean, there's only been two or three black screenwriters before,
translation.es: Solo ha habido dos o tres guionistas negros,

translation.en: Oscar Micheaux, Langston Hughes, but those were race pictures, you know?
translation.es: Micheaux, Hughes, pero eran películas étnicas. ¿Sabes? Historias sobre negros.

translation.en: Stories about black folk.
It's like you can't even run those pictures in parts of this country.
translation.es: Es como que no puedes mostrarlas en partes del país.

translation.en: But, you see, my script’s about a white gal, so...
translation.es: Pero mi guion es sobre una chica blanca y...

translation.en: Who knows? Maybe you could star in it, Roy.
Could you imagine something like that?
- That would be-- - A dream.
Yeah.
Yeah.
In Dreamland.
And if it comes true?
When it comes...
true.
We'd look back and say the two of us meeting was
translation.es: Recordaríamos esto y diríamos que conocernos

translation.en: that Hollywood dream starting to come true.
translation.es: fue el inicio de ese sueño de Hollywood.

translation.en: There you go, Jack.
Buffalo Billy, Slippery Sammy, Rabid Ronny,
translation.es: Billy Bisonte, Sammy Sinvergüenza, Ronny Rabioso,

translation.en: Goody Two- Shoes Glen, and Arch... Welcome to the family.
translation.es: Glen Mojigato y, Arch, bienvenido a la familia.

translation.en: Ernie, what's the matter? You all right?
It's nothing. It's nothing.
This black walnut blooms this time of year.
translation.es: La nuez negra oriental florece ahora.

translation.en: Let's make it another great week, fellas!
- Yes, sir! - Go get 'em. All right.
- What'll it be? - Dreamland.
- Where to? - Dreamland.
- Where to for you? - Dreamland.
Hmm, you are really good at that, you know?
So is this what you do, full time?
No, uh, just to make ends meet.
translation.es: Solo para llegar a fin de mes.

translation.en: I'm an actor.
Really?
I'm in casting.
Excuse me, sorry.
Pardon me.
Jack! I ain't seen you in a while, Bubby! I thought you threw in the towel.
translation.es: ¡Jack! ¡Tanto tiempo, amigo! - ¿No te habías rendido? - No, sigo firme.

translation.en: - No, still pounding the pavement. - Sure, sure. That's great.
translation.es: - ¿No te habías rendido? - No, sigo firme. Claro, genial.

translation.en: Me? I've been working every day this week on a Sidney Lanfield picture.
translation.es: Yo trabajé toda la semana en una película de Sidney Lanfield.

translation.en: - Lot of frame wipes. Know what that is? - Sure.
I walk right next to the camera, real close,
translation.es: Camino junto a la cámara, muy cerca,

translation.en: and the director uses that to cut the scene together.
translation.es: y el director lo usa para unir tomas.

translation.en: Practically editing this goddamn thing. Shh, shh, here she comes!
Okay.
- I need three warm bodies. -
You, you and... you.
That's it. See the rest of youse tomorrow.
translation.es: y... tú. Listo. Nos vemos mañana.

translation.en: Wanna grab a bite to eat? My treat.
No, I think I'm gonna stick around. What are you talking about?
translation.es: - No, creo que me quedaré. - ¿Qué dices?

translation.en: Jack?
Get in here.
What the hell's going on?
Oh, I, uh, I got a walk- on role in a Cecil B. DeMille picture.
translation.es: Seré extra en una película de Cecil B. DeMille.

translation.en: Might get a line!
Hey, something's gonna happen for you one of these days, Lou, I know it!
translation.es: ¡Tendrás algo uno de estos días! ¡Lo sé!

translation.en: How are you?
I love this town.
Hello, sweetheart.
What are you doing?
Nothing, just cooking dinner for my wife.
translation.es: Nada, solo preparo la cena para mi esposa.

translation.en: Hungry?
No, suspicious.
What did you do?
Uh, nothing, nothing. Just come here. Sit down.
We're celebrating.
Celebrating what?
You quitting your job.
- What? I like working at Schwab's! - I can't have you on your feet all day.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? ¡Me gusta trabajar en Schwab's! - Debes descansar.

translation.en: You're three months along, I don't want you working anymore, all right?
translation.es: Embarazada de tres meses, no quiero que sigas trabajando, ¿sí?

translation.en: Not another word about it.
Let's eat.
Just eat!
Oh...
my...
- God. - That's $500.
How-- How did you get this?
I've been doing good work at the gas station.
Rent's already paid, gas and electric too.
Now, that ain't for spending, all right?
That's a down- payment... on a house.
translation.es: Es un pago inicial... para una casa.

translation.en: Oh, my God. I-- I don't...
I thought that's what you wanted.
It is, I just can't believe it!
Oh, my God!
Thank you! Thank you.
Anything for you. Anything for my family.
translation.es: Lo que sea por ti y mi familia.

translation.en: What does that mean, sexually ambidextrous?
That means that my man Stan here likes the cat and the kitty.
translation.es: Significa que a mi amigo Stan le gusta dar y recibir.

translation.en: Huh, no fooling?
Well, welcome aboard, Stan.
- - Thanks.
All yours, Jack.
- Fill 'er up? - Dreamland.
- Hello. - How are you?
- Better now, thank you. - Glad to hear it.
Oh, no, uh, I don't touch the money. You pay Ernie and Ernie pays me.
translation.es: Yo no toco el dinero. Usted le paga a Ernie y él, a mí.

translation.en: Well, what about a tip?
Well, you can give it to me after, if you're satisfied.
translation.es: Puede dármela después si está satisfecha.

translation.en: Well, wouldn't this ensure that I'm satisfied?
Okay, thanks.
- You're under arrest. - What?
Got him!
Wait a minute, what is it? Whoa, buddy, buddy, what is this?
- Wait a minute, wait! - Shut up!
You're under arrest for solicitation and lewd conduct
translation.es: Está bajo arresto por prostitución y conducta lasciva

translation.en: pursuant to California Penal Code, section 647- B.
translation.es: conforme al Código Penal de California, sección 647-B.
